title: Dynamic Re-tasking due to System Failure
description: The primary aircraft for a time-sensitive strike mission has a critical system failure on takeoff. A backup aircraft must be immediately launched and re-tasked.

tasks.description: Receive a report of the system failure and the primary aircraft aborting the mission.
Immediately order the launch of the pre-designated backup aircraft.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully launches the backup aircraft.

tasks.description: Transfer the mission plan and target data from the primary aircraft to the backup aircraft while it is en route.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully transfers the mission data, allowing the backup aircraft to complete the mission with minimal delay.
